rdsi.pacelf.phase3:document.title: The role of polymerase chain reaction techniques for assessing lymphatic filariasis transmission
rdsi.pacelf.phase3:document.description: Overview: An international workshop entitled "Lymphatic Filariasis: Use of PCR in Monitoring Transmission" was held on 7-10 November 2006. The purpose of the meeting was to discuss and standardize the use of PCR as a tool for monitoting the success or failure of mass drug distribution (MDA) programmes and to aid in determining when MDA prgrammes can be terminated.
